Meta.title: Cure Mutation Body Part Reborn
Meta.author: zwa73
Meta.description:
如果你拥有 [变异体] 特性(变异人种族特性), 并且点了 [肉体变异] 特性, 同时当前除光源{肢体}外还有至少两个{肢体} 那么在产生 治疗变异/以太病 效果时, 若无可治疗项, 会随机治疗你的一个{肢体}, 同时扣除 [肉体变异] 并返还专长点 治疗{肢体}之后，可能会出现一些ui上的装备槽类型错误以及装备乱位的问题 可以通过保存/加载，或是重进游戏修正 (我不确定是否还有隐性问题, 因为实际上没有官方的减少方法, 同时ChangeRace指令也会产生相同问题)
If you have the [Mutating Body] trait (mutant racial trait) and have activated the [Mutation Body Part] trait, while having at least two {Body Parts} other than light source {Body Parts} Then during the occurrence of the Cure Mutation/Ether Disease effect, if there are no items to cure, a random {Body Part} will be cured. This will also remove the [Mutation Body Part] trait and return the feat points After curing {Body Parts}, some UI equipment slot errors and equipment dislocation issues may occur These issues can be fixed by saving/loading or re-entering the game (I am not sure if there are any latent issues, as there is no official method to reduce them, and the ChangeRace command can also cause the same issues)
